title: Harntung
description: Eating differently, dividing differently. Have you ever? Go traveling with friends, then have a headache when dividing up the various expenses. It takes all day to get it cleared up. Turn a difficult situation into an easy one, use Harntung to calculate expenses in your group. It helps you avoid headaches and have more time to live life. No matter what you're dividing, you can use Harntung.
